name: Imagine
description:
Made in 72 hours for Krassjam 6. However, I was quite busy with other errands this weekend, and didn't get to spend as much time as I wanted on the project. 

The theme for the jam was randomly generated for each contestant. My theme was "A game where you rethink random worlds with your eyes closed." I tried to make a game where the player draws the art himself, thus "rethinking random worlds". I really liked the idea, but it was a bit difficult to execute because I had to work with a lot of Unity Components that I don't have a lot of experience with. If I had another 10 hours or so I think it would have run a bit more smoothly, but hey! At least it's been a great learning experience!

Good luck!
